title: Wede Harer Guzo
subtitle: Hailu Mergia and the Dahlak Band
description: Strange, beautiful music that captures a wistful happiness.

title: Bob's Red Mill Muesli
subtitle: Old Country Style
description: Or as we call it in our house, _Bob's Moulin Rouge._ Probably [60% of my diet.]()

title: HEY
subtitle: Email from Basecamp
description: Masterful design rescues email from decades of ossified ideas. A true solution to email hell.

title: 88% Dark Chocolate
subtitle: Endangered Species
description: Excellent chocolate for a good cause. Cheaper per gram and more generous than the other fancy brands.

title: Barter 6
subtitle: Young Thug
description: Thugger is a true innovator as a vocalist. Also possibly an alien.

title: Unread
description: My most-used app. Perfect interaction design that has weathered a decade of app fads unchanged, and good typography to boot. The only way to read RSS.

title: The Culture Clash
subtitle: Jean Donaldson
description: Required reading for dog owners. Fascinating, funny, practical guide to behaviorism.

title: Lip Trip
subtitle: Mountain Ocean
description: Low key the world's greatest lip balm.

title: Donuts
subtitle: J Dilla
description: A masterpiece produced in a hospital deathbed. Transcends the sum of its samples.

title: Buddy’s Burrito Bar
subtitle: Brooklyn
description: Perfect neighborhood taqueria & grill in Carroll Gardens.

title: On Writing Well
subtitle: William Zinsser
description: A writing guide with broader applicability to living life.

title: VHB Tape
subtitle: 3M
description: “Very High Bond”. Stick anything to anything permanently. Remove it without damage when you change your mind.

title: Workflowy
description: The only notetaking app that understands that a brain is shaped like a tree, not a filing cabinet.

title: Aphex Twin
description: The best kind of artist. A unique master craftsman, a mysterious mythical figure, a genius composer. Possibly an alien.

title: Longmont Potion Castle
description: Anonymous artist of surrealist prank phone calls, active for 40 years. Enjoyment requires seeing the difference between deliberately dumb and actually stupid.
